graph_title: Social protection beneficiaries by type of beneficiary and sex
indicator_name: Social protection beneficiaries by type of beneficiary and sex
title: Untitled
national_geographical_coverage: Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina, cantons.
computation_definitions: Social protection beneficiary is every person who has used certain forms and measures of cosial protection and social work services, once or several times during the reference year.Minors beneficiary:Endagered by family situation, Mentally and psysically handicaped persons, Persons with social unacceptable behavior, Mentally ill persons, Persons in defferent social and protective needs, Without specific category, Adult beneficiary- Beneficiaries of subventions, Mentally and physically handicaped persons, Persons with social unacceptable behavior, Mentally ill persons; Persons not having sufficient income to support themselves, Without specific category.
